import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const FeaturedProjects = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Initialize navigate return (

OUR WORK

{/* Cricket Project */}
navigate('/cricket')} // Navigate to cricket page >

CRICKET

{/* Repeat for other sports with corresponding onClick navigation */}
navigate('/football')} >

FOOTBALL

{/* Repeat similar blocks for other sports like Handball, Tennis, Kabaddi, Athletics, etc. */}
); }; export default FeaturedProjects;
